label: logicC:marketing_en
steps: [1] If we launch a social media campaign, then we generate website traffic.
[2] If we generate website traffic, then we collect qualified leads.
[3] If we have both qualified leads and a prepared nurturing email sequence, then we convert leads into customers.
[4] We have a prepared nurturing email sequence.
[5] We launch a social media campaign.
[6] For every prospect x, if x matches our ideal customer profile, then x is eligible for targeted messaging.
[7] Prospect a matches our ideal customer profile.
[8] For every prospect x, if x is eligible for targeted messaging, then x either books a demo or starts a free trial.
[11] We convert leads into customers. (from [3] and [10] and [4])
[12] Prospect a is eligible for targeted messaging, and either a books a demo or a starts a free trial. (from [6], [7], [8])
